Retrieves a list of OAuth provider information associated with the authenticated user.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<OauthProviderInfo[]>`
A promise that resolves to an array of `OauthProviderInfo` objects
